Package fi.abo.kogni.soile2.http_server.userManagement

Class SoileUserManager

java.lang.Object
fi.abo.kogni.soile2.http_server.userManagement.SoileUserManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
io.vertx.ext.auth.mongo.MongoUserUtil
public class SoileUserManager extends Object implements io.vertx.ext.auth.mongo.MongoUserUtil
This class encapsulates all activity correlating to user management interaction with the MongoDB database. This includes authorization, authentication as well as user generation, and password hashing.
Author:
thomas

    • checkEmailPresent

      public SoileUserManager checkEmailPresent(String email, io.vertx.core.Handler<io.vertx.core.AsyncResult<Boolean>> handler)
      Check whether the Email listed is present in the email list of the database. The handler needs to handle the AsyncResult that is the number of entries with that email.
      Parameters:
      email - The email address to check
      handler - the Handler to handle the result of the call
      Returns:
      this object for chained commands

    • isEmailInUse

      public io.vertx.core.Future<Boolean> isEmailInUse(String email, String excludeUser)
      Check whether the Email listed is present in the email list of the database. The handler needs to handle the AsyncResult that is the number of entries with that email.
      Parameters:
      email - The email address to check
      excludeUser - A user to exclude for the lookup
      Returns:
      A Future that contains a boolean inidcating whether the email is in use

    • getUserList

      public io.vertx.core.Future<io.vertx.core.json.JsonArray> getUserList(Integer skip, Integer limit, String query, String type, boolean namesOnly)
      Get the list of users,
      Parameters:
      skip - how many results to skip
      limit - how many results at most to return
      query - a search query to look up in the usernames
      type - The type of user (i.e. their role, Researcher, Participant, Admin), providing User will return all Researchers and Admins
      namesOnly - only list the names
      Returns:
      A List of JsonObjects with the results.

    • getUserList

    • changePermissions

      public SoileUserManager changePermissions(String username, io.vertx.ext.auth.mongo.MongoAuthorizationOptions options, io.vertx.core.json.JsonArray permissions, SoileUserManager.PermissionChange alterationFlag, io.vertx.core.Handler<io.vertx.core.AsyncResult<Void>> resultHandler)
      Change roles or permissions indicating the correct field of the database.
      Parameters:
      username - the id to add the roles/permissions for.
      options - The MongoAuthorizationOptions used (indicating field names)
      permissions - the list of roles or permissions to change
      alterationFlag - Whether to add, remove or replace the indicated permissions.
      resultHandler - the handler for the results.
      Returns:
      this object

    • changePermissions

    • getParticipantIDForUserInStudy

      public io.vertx.core.Future<String> getParticipantIDForUserInStudy(String username, String project)
      Retrieve the participant ID of this user in the given project.
      Parameters:
      username - the username to get the partiicpant for
      project - the project for which to get the Participants ID for this given username
      Returns:
      A Future of the ID of the participant for this user in the project.If the user has no participant in the project, the Future will be null.

    • getParticipantInfoForUser

      public io.vertx.core.Future<io.vertx.core.json.JsonArray> getParticipantInfoForUser(String username)
      Get all project/participant ID combinations for the given user.
      Parameters:
      username - The user for which data is requested.
      Returns:
      A Future of a JsonArray containing objects with { UUID: <participantID : <IDofParticipantInStudy> }.

      Parameters:
      username - the user for which to change the information

      A Future that indicates whether this operation was a success

    • removeParticipantInStudyFromUsers

      public io.vertx.core.Future<Void> removeParticipantInStudyFromUsers(String studyID, String participantID)
      Remove Participants in specific studies from users. This is mainly necessary if a study got reset. This is primarily an update method for the user db, in order to stay in sync with the participant dbs.
      Parameters:
      studyID - the ID of the study to remove the participant form
      participantID - the participant to remove
      Returns:
      A Future of a JsonOBject with the permissions.

    • getUserAccessInfo

      public io.vertx.core.Future<io.vertx.core.json.JsonObject> getUserAccessInfo(String username)
      Get the Information about a users Permissions/Access
      Parameters:
      username - The username for which to get the permissions
      Returns:
      A Future of a JsonOBject with the permissions.

    • getUserWithAccessToStudy

      public io.vertx.core.Future<io.vertx.core.json.JsonArray> getUserWithAccessToStudy(String studyID)
      Get users with access to a specific Study
      Parameters:
      studyID - the Study for which to retrieve users
      Returns:
      A JsonArray of objects with "user" and "access" fields, where access is one of READ / READ_WRITE / FULL and user is a username
